description._instruction: Enter a description of this protocol execution.
description.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
description.title: description

input._instruction: Add all inputs (subject state, tissue sample state, file instance or file bundle) used by this protocol execution.
input.description: Something or someone that is put into or participates in a process or machine.
input.title: input

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this protocol execution that may help you to more easily find it again.
lookupLabel.title: lookupLabel

output._instruction: Add all outputs (subject state, tissue sample state, file instance or file bundle) generated by this protocol execution.
output.description: Something or someone that comes out of, is delivered or produced by a process or machine.
output.title: output

parameterSet._instruction: Add all important parameters grouped in context-specific sets that were used in this protocol execution.
parameterSet.description: Manner, position, or direction in which digital or physical properties are set to determine a particular function, characteristics or behavior of something.
parameterSet.title: parameterSet

preparationType._instruction: Add the initial preparation type for this protocol execution.
preparationType.description: Distinct class of actions or processes that make something ready for use or service.
preparationType.title: preparationType

protocol._instruction: Add the protocol of this protocol execution.
protocol.description: Plan that describes the process of a scientific or medical experiment, treatment, or procedure.
protocol.title: protocol

semanticallyAnchoredTo._instruction: Add all anatomical entities to which the outputs of this protocol execution can be semantically anchored to.
semanticallyAnchoredTo.description: Reference to a related anatomical structure without providing a quantitative proof of the claimed relation.
semanticallyAnchoredTo.title: semanticallyAnchoredTo

studyTarget._instruction: Add all study targets of this model version.
studyTarget.description: Structure or function that was targeted within a study.
studyTarget.title: studyTarget

description: Structured information on a protocol execution.
